This has been the theme of the last three weeks..asking this question again and again as I felt that creating software projects or entrepreneurship leads me to the wrong directions. This blog post will cover how I tackle a fundamental question that everybody should think about asking themselves..

Software development is hard. That’s why companies pay a lot for developers creating solutions to the world’s problems.

“Am I solving the right problem?” - a question rich in ideas and if diagnosed properly like cancer, can reveal weak spots needed to be addressed and habits needed to be improved or removed… but it all relies on figuring out the answer to the question.
